name: The King's Crown is Missing
description:
This game basically revolves around a crown.

A crown!?

Features:

  • A name input screen, because your name shouldn't have to be Walter
  • A bunch of crates - 14 to be exact
  • A mouse (for computers) in one of those crates
  • Everyone but the king gets a hat
  • Absolutely no one appreciates kitchen furniture
  • Did I mention crates?
  • Doesn't take long to complete the game
  • A reward for completing the game
  • Oracle Times!
  • Reading newspaper headlines!
  • Food that doesn't actually appear in-game
  • Antique explosives that don't get used

In a post-jam version, I might add some semi-forced linearity (meaning you can't advance the plot by talking to people/activating things in the wrong order).

Get in Touch

Use feedback/help if you need to give/get one of those.

Use dev if you would like to make a game with me.

Otherwise, use general.
